mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum rn,s.sch_no,s.mem_no,s.sch_title,s.from_date,s.to_date,s.img,s.sch_reg_date,s.sch_last_date,s.sch_status,s.memo,s.sch_region,b.pick_cnt from schedule s, pick_sch pl, board b where b.sch_no = s.sch_no and s.sch_no = pl.sch_no and pl.mem_no = #{memNo} and rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}

select * from ( select rownum rn,s.sch_no,s.mem_no,s.sch_title,s.from_date,s.to_date,s.img,s.sch_reg_date,s.sch_last_date,s.sch_status,s.memo,s.sch_region from schedule s, pick_sch pl where s.to_date < SYSDATE and s.sch_no = pl.sch_no and pl.mem_no = #{memNo} and rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}

select * from ( select rownum rn,s.sch_no,s.mem_no,s.sch_title,s.from_date,s.to_date,s.img,s.sch_reg_date,s.sch_last_date,s.sch_status,s.memo,s.sch_region from schedule s, pick_sch pl where s.to_date > SYSDATE and s.sch_no = pl.sch_no and pl.mem_no = #{memNo} and rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
select count(*) from schedule s, pick_sch pl where s.sch_no = pl.sch_no and pl.mem_no = #{memNo}

select count(*) from schedule s, pick_sch pl where s.sch_no = pl.sch_no and pl.mem_no = #{memNo} and s.to_date > SYSDATE

select * from ( select rownum no,a.* from (select s.sch_no,s.mem_no,s.sch_title,s.from_date,s.to_date,s.img,s.sch_reg_date,s.sch_last_date,s.sch_status,s.memo,s.sch_region,b.pick_cnt from schedule s, pick_sch pl, board b where s.sch_no = b.sch_no and s.sch_no = pl.sch_no and pl.mem_no = #{memNo} order by case when #{selected}='old' then pl.ps_date end desc, case when #{selected}='new' then pl.ps_date end asc, case when #{selected}='like' then b.pick_cnt end desc, s.sch_no desc )a where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where no >= (#{pageNum} -1) *#{amount}+1
